text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Nyehehe... Hehehahaheheh...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Whoops, could you hear that? I was<n>just making some
fangirl battle plans<n>for my next day off and got a little<n>
carried away.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I've really been trying to pour extra<n>love into my simping
lately. Y'know, to<n>make good on the whole "resolve"<n>
thing!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...I guess I have been doing mydue diligence. I give praise at mymerch shrine every single day andthank my idols for their blessings.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
All right, you've won me over. I'll be<n>an all-rounder! I'll run
turf and dirt and<n>admire all my oshis up close!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Lady Luck favors those who do good<n>deeds, so I
accumulate karma by<n>supporting my favorite racers.<n>
Therefore, fangirling is an essential<n>part of my training!

I'm still shaky on the details of what<n>"simping" entails, but if
it involves<n>training...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Join me? To go simping? I mean,<n>you're welcome to come
if you want.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Just, are you sure? I'm talking likehardcore simping. I completelyunderstand that some types ofevents aren't for everyone, so youdon't have to force yourself...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...I respect the resolve, Trainer. So I<n>won't hold back! We're
going on a<n>full tour of my oshis' races!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Gwaaaajkahdk! It was so worthcoming out to Hanshin Racecourseee!What an amazing debut!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
The runner who got first place is<n>actually the younger sister
of a racer<n>who just retired last season.<n>Apparently, she
debuted to carry on<n>the mantleeeee!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Neither of them's letting up! The<n>rivals are neck and neck!
But the<n>homestretch of Nakayama<n>Racecourse is
famously shoooort!<n>Aaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Sniffle... Sob... What a beautifulrace! Their feelings for each otherwent beyond mere aptitudes... Theyweren't just neck and neck, but alsoheart-to-heart! I can't even...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
The dirt track at Oi Racecourse is<n>pretty long compared to
most places.<n>The extra distance allows late<n>surgers and
end closers room to<n>shine.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Even so, she chose to tackle the race<n>as a front runnerâ€”true
to her heart.<n>She had such a proud, satisfied grin<n>at the
end... It didn't matter that she<n>got fourth.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Do you feel that?! The passionradiating from all those beautifulUmamusume?! Their smiles just fillmy heart with so much joy!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
C'mon! Let's channel this energy<n>into merch shopping! Are
you ready to<n>hit the booths?!
choice_data_list: Not as ready as you, it seems...
Not as ready as you, it seems...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Trainer, are you okay? You look<n>completely wiped, so
you hang tight<n>and leave the spoils to me!

I take Digital up on that and rest for a<n>while, but... she
doesn't come back.<n>Worried, I go looking for her.

I can't believe I'm looking at the real<n>Agnes Digital! I'm a
huge fan! Huge!

text_block_list.name: Fan
text_block_list.text:
I was blown away by your decision to<n>run turf and dirt!
What's the whole<n>story behind that?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Uh, well I... I um... I kinda,<n>y'know... yeah.

Ah. Fan interaction. Seeing Digital<n>struggle to form a
response, I jump in<n>to help.
choice_data_list: It all started when we were watching a race...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah... T-Trainerrr!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Sigh. You saved my life backthere. I'm still not used to peoplewanting to talk to me...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
That aside, though, why are you<n>here? You looked kinda
lost.
choice_data_list: It'd been a while since you left, so...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So you... You fought back your<n>fatigue... and came all this
way? Oh,<n>Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
You should've told me you were that<n>excited to go merch
shopping!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, I totally know the<n>feeling! How could we wait
with all<n>that glorious merchandise waiting for<n>us?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I swear we've got the same brain.<n>For real for real. I'm so
glad you're<n>enjoying the little simp tour I tossed<n>together!

Seeing the way she beams at me... I<n>don't correct the
misunderstanding. I<n>let her pull me from booth to booth,<n>
listening to her happily chat away.
